lines.text:
[after shooting a guy in the crotch]
What's the matter? Forget your bulletproof cup?

[Sees a bunch of dead soldiers after a take over]
Well, this is another fine mess I got myself into.
You fuck up this time and both your heads on my wall.

[Vartan catches up Ira and Dr. Levin]
Surprise, surprise, Doctor.
[Ira starts covering Dr. Levin]
Ha-ha, how noble!
[Shoots Ira]

[about Dutton]
He has a heart not like you.
Oh, really? Ramos, you take care of her, Gallo, bring me Hatfield's heart.
Are you joining us on a tour to the facility, Sergeant?
No, sir-doc, my job is just to ensure in your safe arrival at R.D.I.
We still appreciate that, Sergeant. How long have you been in Special Operations?
All over ten years now. How did you know I was in Special OP?
I was in that career myself.
Is that so?
Yeah. The point of military intelligence. Retired Colonel.
It's quite a career, sir.
It was a long time ago. Another life. Tell me, Sergeant, seen any action?
Iraq.
Stupid war.
Sir?
Stupid war. We could've eliminated Sadam in '85. Those people are so afraid to make a decision that they don't make one of them. Minimum risks.
Is this why you're retired now?
Yeah. Let's just say I gave advice to my superior and he disagreed. Is this the way to the Chiefs? So...
[they both smile]
